sen.j: 二条城前駅（にじょうじょうまええき）は、京都市中京区二条城町にある、京都市営地下鉄京都市営地下鉄東西線の鉄道駅。
sen.e: Located in Nijojo-cho, Nakagyo Ward, Kyoto City, Nijojo-mae Station is a stop of the Tozai Line, which is operated by Kyoto City Subway
sen.cmt: ”京都市営地下鉄京都市営地下鉄”は”京都市営地下鉄”がだぶっているように思われますので、一方を削除したとして訳してあります。
sen.e: Nijojo-mae station, located in Nijojo-cho, Nakagyo Ward, Kyoto City, is a stop on the Tozai Line, which is operated by Kyoto City Subway.
Nijojo-mae station, located in Nijojo-cho, Nakagyo Ward, Kyoto City, is a stop on the Tozai Line, which is operated by Kyoto Municipal Subway.

sen.j: 二条城の南東角側、押小路通の堀川通西入の地下にある。
sen.e: It is located at the western entrance to Horikawa-dori Street from Oshikoji-dori Street, at the south-east corner of Nijo-jo Castle.
It is located at the western entrance to Horikawa-dori Street from Oshikoji-dori Street, at the south-east corner of Nijo-jo Castle.
It is located underground at Horikawa-dori Nishi-iru of Oshikoji-dori Street, at the south-east corner of Nijo-jo Castle.
sen.cmt: 堀川西入 をそのまま表記しました。

sen.j: 島式ホーム1面2線の地下駅。
sen.e: It is an underground station, with an island platform serving two tracks.
It's an underground station with an island platform serving two tracks.
It's an underground station with an island platform serving two tracks.

sen.j: なお、駅構内に文化財の展示ケースを設置して、地下鉄東西線建設にともなう発掘調査の成果とその出土遺物（当駅に隣接する神泉苑跡出土遺物など）を展示しており、ミニ博物館の感がある。
sen.e: Cases for displaying cultural properties are placed in the premises of the station, and excavation results corresponding to the construction of Tozai Line and old artefacts excavated (such as old artefacts excavated from a former portion of Shinsenen Temple) are displayed there, making the area look like a mini-museum.

Cases for the display of cultural properties are found in the premises of the station, and excavation results corresponding to the construction of the Tozai Line and old artifacts excavated (such as old items excavated from a former portion of Shinsenen Temple) are displayed there, making the area look like a miniature museum.

Cases for the display of cultural properties are found in the premises of the station, and excavation results corresponding to the construction of the subway Tozai Line and old artifacts excavated (such as old items excavated from a former portion of Shinsen-en Temple) are displayed there, making the area look like a miniature museum.
sen.cmt: 地下鉄 を追加しました。

sen.j: 京都市中京区役所、中京消防署（中京区総合庁舎）
sen.e: Nakagyo Ward Office, Kyoto City and the Nakagyo fire station (in the integrated Nakagyo Ward office)
Nakagyo Ward Office, Kyoto City, and the Nakagyo fire station (integrated with Nakagyo Ward Office)
Nakagyo Ward Office, Kyoto City, and the Nakagyo fire station (integrated with Nakagyo Ward Office)

sen.cmt: 一つのセルにまとめました。

sen.j: 1997年10月12日 東西線醍醐～二条間開業時に設置。
sen.e: October 12, 1997: This station was established when Tozai Line started operation between Daigo and Nijo.
October 12, 1997: This station was established when the Tozai Line started operating between Daigo and Nijo.
October 12, 1997: This station was established when the Tozai Line started operating between Daigo and Nijo.

sen.j: 当初、交差する大通りの名前から「堀川」と名づけられる予定であったが、その後、観光客のことを考慮し「二条城前」に変更された。
sen.e: Initially, it was planned to name the station "Horikawa" after the name of the avenue which this station crosses, but the name was changed to "Nijojo-mae"considering the existence of the tourists using this station.

Initially, it was planned to name the station "Horikawa" after the name of the avenue that the station crosses, but the name was changed to "Nijojo-mae" in consideration of the tourists that would use the station.

Initially, it was planned to name the station 'Horikawa' after the name of the avenue that the station crosses, but the name was changed to 'Nijojo-mae' in consideration of the tourists that would use the station.

sen.j: 2007年（平成19年）4月1日 PiTaPa使用開始。

tit.cmt: 他ファイルと統一しました。

sen.j: 烏丸御池駅(T13) - 二条城前駅(T14) - 二条駅(T15)
sen.e: Karasuma Oike Station (T13) - Nijojo-mae Station (T14) - Nijojo Station
Karasuma Oike Station (T13) - Nijojo-mae Station (T14) - Nijojo Station
Karasuma Oike Station (T13) - Nijojo-mae Station (T14) - Nijo Station (T15)
sen.cmt: Nijo Station (T15) と変更しました。
